sentence.Network_en: The scientific name for common salt is sodium chloride.
Common salt is made up of 40% sodium and 60% chloride.

sentence.Network_en: The fish or seafood is heavily salted with pure sodium chloride.

entry.def: Chloride is a chemical compound of chlorine and another substance.

example.ex: The scientific name for common salt is sodium chloride.

means.word_mean: 1. any compound containing a chlorine atom
2. any salt of hydrochloric acid (containing the chloride ion)
